name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in **Backend Development**, specializing in **API Design** and **Microservices Architecture**. Proven expertise in developing scalable backend systems and high-performing APIs, employing **Python** frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**. Extensive knowledge of **Cloud Services** including **AWS** and **Azure**, with a strong focus on **Database Management** and ensuring system **Scalability**. Recognized for exceptional **Problem Solving** skills and ability to collaborate effectively in **Remote Work** environments. Contributed to high-impact projects at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
• Engineered backend services in **Python** using **FastAPI** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows, enhancing user experience by **30%**.
• Designed robust **API** endpoints adhering to best practices for seamless integration with front-end applications and third-party services, improving data accessibility.
• Developed **microservices architecture** leveraging **Azure App Services** for scalability, successfully increasing system reliability to handle **10,000+** concurrent users.
• Implemented asynchronous processing solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** to manage financial transaction requests, reducing processing time by **15%**.
• Deployed and managed infrastructure as code using **Terraform**, ensuring seamless cloud operations and facilitating smoother deployments.
• Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely and accurate data flow across systems.
• Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure, scalable authentication systems, enhancing security compliance ratings by **25%**.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, addressing system integration challenges, ensuring compliance, and overseeing release strategies for successful product launches.

• Backend Development: Developed robust backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and improve complex reporting processes, resulting in a 30% reduction in processing time.
• API Design: Created RESTful APIs for event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of over **1,000 transactions** per minute.
• Microservices Architecture: Managed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments, improving deployment speed by **25%**.
• Cloud Services: Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, achieving a **40%** increase in data flow efficiency.
• Database Management: Performed security audits and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for comprehensive authentication and secure access controls, enhancing security compliance by **50%**.
• Scalability: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, contributing to the successful release of over **5 projects**.
• Problem Solving: Proactively identified and resolved system performance issues, improving overall system reliability and user satisfaction.
• Collaboration: Effectively worked in a remote environment, facilitating regular communication among team members to meet project deadlines.

• Spearheaded **Backend Development** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking utilizing **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations, leading to a **15%** increase in processing efficiency.
• Designed and implemented real-time price feed processors using **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, enabling delivery of trading data within **100 milliseconds** to support high-frequency transactions.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to create and maintain **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring a seamless user experience with a platform that serves **over 5,000** clients daily.
• Ensured adherence to regulatory frameworks such as **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while strengthening internal data security protocols through proactive measures.
• Developed comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes, reducing development cycle times by **30%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management to handle an increase in transactional volume by **50%**.
